comments:
Build ID:  M20071023-1652

Steps To Reproduce:
Install Yourkit Java profiler.  Attempt to profile an application.  However the launch type doesn't show because WST Server plugin throws an NPE.

The exception is below

More information:
!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 0 2007-11-04 22:20:39.500

Was fixed for WTP 2.0.1 via bug 204688 but didn't make it in because of a tagging error. Fix was dropped in 2.0.2 via bug 206866, so this should be fine if you pick up one of the recent 2.0.2 or 3.0 builds.

(In reply to comment #1)
> Was fixed for WTP 2.0.1 via bug 204688 but didn't make it in because of a
> tagging error. Fix was dropped in 2.0.2 via bug 206866, so this should be fine
> if you pick up one of the recent 2.0.2 or 3.0 builds.
> 

Seems like 2.0.2 is not available through the update sites, only a manual download.
Correct, update manager sites only show declared releases. (2.0.2 is scheduled for Feb)
